description:
Sango`s younger brother, Kohaku, who`s supposed to be dead, is alive. Naraku reveals that Kohaku is living because of a sacred jewel shard that is planted in his back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A angústia de Sango e a vida de Kohaku
El sufrimiento de Sango y la vida de Kohaku
La souffrance de Sango et la vie de Kohaku
Sango no Kunou to Kohaku no Inochi
珊瑚の苦悩と琥珀の命
